seo.title: Home
seo.description: Tina is a content management platform, with a content management API and frontend toolkit to rapidly prototype your own CMS.

blocks.headline: Unlock your content team with next-gen editing
blocks.subline: Tina is an open-source content editing UI for the JAMstack

items.headline: Plugin Into Any Data Source, Edit with Tina
items.subline: Tina can connect to any API that stores content such as GitHub, a headless CMS, 3rd-party APIs, or even the file system.

items.headline: Visual Editing
items.subline: Most CMSs feel like GUI on a database. Tina gives your team a contextual, intuitive experience.

items.headline: Built for the JAMstack
items.subline: Tina is designed for the JAMstack and currently works for React-based sites

items.headline: Integrate Your Design Systems
items.subline: Allow your team to pick from your custom, predefined components to build pages.
